00015 #include <stdlib.h>
00016 #include <stdio.h>
00017 #include <getopt.h>
00018 #include <yyast/main.h>
00019 #include <yyast/utils.h>
00020 #include <yyast/node.h>
00021 #include <yyast/count.h>
00022 
00023 extern FILE *yyin;
00024 int yyparse();
00025 
00026 char *ya_output_filename = NULL;
00027 char *ya_input_filename = NULL;
00028 
00029 void ya_usage(int exit_code)
00030 {
00031     fprintf(stderr, "Usage:\n");
00032     fprintf(stderr, "  application -h\n");
00033     fprintf(stderr, "  application [-c] [-o output file] input file\n");
00034     fprintf(stderr, "\n");
00035     fprintf(stderr, "Options:\n");
00036     fprintf(stderr, "  -h   Show help message\n");
00037     fprintf(stderr, "  -c   Compile, this option is ignored\n");
00038     fprintf(stderr, "  -o   Set the output file, the default is the same as the input file\n");
00039     fprintf(stderr, "\n");
00040     exit(exit_code);
00041 }
00042 
00043 void ya_parse_options(int argc, char *argv[], char *extension)
00044 {
00045     int             ch;
00046     struct option   longopts[] = {
00047         {"output",  required_argument, NULL, 'o'},
00048         {"compile", no_argument,       NULL, 'c'},
00049         {"help",    no_argument,       NULL, 'h'},
00050         {NULL,      0,                 NULL, 0}
00051     };
00052 
00053     while ((ch = getopt_long(argc, argv, "hco:", longopts, NULL)) != -1) {
00054         switch (ch) {
00055         case 'o':
00056             // Set the output filename.
00057             ya_output_filename = optarg;
00058             break;
00059         case 'h':
00060             // Help, just shows usage without error.
00061             ya_usage(0);
00062         case 'c':
00063             // Compile, which is the only mode it supports.
00064             break;
00065         case 0:
00066             break;
00067         case ':':
00068             fprintf(stderr, "Missing option argument.");
00069             ya_usage(2);
00070         case '?':
00071             fprintf(stderr, "Unknown option.");
00072             ya_usage(2);
00073         default:
00074             fprintf(stderr, "Unknown error in getopt_long().");
00075             ya_usage(2);
00076         }
00077     }
00078     argc -= optind;
00079     argv += optind;
00080 
00081     if (argc != 1) {
00082         fprintf(stderr, "Expecting a single filename.\n");
00083         ya_usage(2);
00084     }
00085 
00086     ya_input_filename = argv[0];
00087 
00088     if (ya_output_filename == NULL) {
00089         // output file was not explicityly set, therfor we generate it from the input filename.
00090         ya_output_filename = ya_new_extension(ya_input_filename, extension);
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 int ya_main(int argc, char *argv[], char *extension)
00095 {
00096     FILE    *out;
00097     char    *reposition_s;
00098 
00099     ya_parse_options(argc, argv, extension);
00100 
00101     if (strcmp(ya_input_filename, "-") == 0) {
00102         yyin = stdin;
00103     } else {
00104         if ((yyin = fopen(ya_input_filename, "r")) == NULL) {
00105             perror("Could not open input file");
00106             return -1;
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     asprintf(&reposition_s, "1 \"%s\"", ya_input_filename);
00111     ya_reposition(reposition_s, strlen(reposition_s));
00112     free(reposition_s);
00113 
00114     yyparse();
00115     fclose(yyin);
00116 
00117     if (strcmp(ya_output_filename, "-") == 0) {
00118         out = stdout;
00119     } else {
00120         if ((out = fopen(ya_output_filename, "w")) == NULL) {
00121             perror("Could not open output file");
00122             return -1;
00123         }
00124     }
00125     ya_node_save(out, &ya_start);
00126     fclose(out);
00127 
00128     return 0;
00129 }
